title: WhisperX diarization fails in benchmark
description: Benchmark run failed for diarization with error: module 'whisperx' has no attribute 'load_diarize_model'. See benchmark output from make benchmark.
notes: Updated WhisperX diarization to use DiarizationPipeline for whisperx>=3.4.2; now fails only due to gated pyannote model without HF token. Added support for HUGGINGFACE_TOKEN/HF_TOKEN/HUGGINGFACE_HUB_TOKEN env vars.
close_reason: Updated diarization API and added HF token support

title: Document HF token requirement for WhisperX diarization
description: WhisperX diarization now uses DiarizationPipeline; pyannote/speaker-diarization is gated and needs HF token (HUGGINGFACE_TOKEN/HF_TOKEN/HUGGINGFACE_HUB_TOKEN). Document setup or env var.
